titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the 1993 increase in income taxes on Social Security benefits.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
3/6/2007--Introduced.
Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal, effective January 1, 2007, the 1993 increase in income taxes on Social Security benefits.
